attributes.action: to promote the teaching of creation as an alternative view to the theory of evolution in all state schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Creation has until recent times been the understood way in which this world came in to effect. However as the theory of evolution has now become the excepted and universal but unproven belief the National Curiculium should be altered to allow for Creation or Intelligent Design to be taught as an alternative theory.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
